name: Circa Infinity [Demo]
description:
Circa Infinity is a brain-melting circular platformer by Kenny Sun, with a pulse-pounding soundtrack by Jack + Jim Fay.

Pre-order the game now!

This free demo includes the first 10 of the 50 levels of the game, along with the first boss fight.

Circa Infinity will be available to play on Steam on September 9, 2015. You can contact me to send feedback or ask questions through E-mail or Twitter.
